import re

def find_word_indices(text, word):
    word_pattern = re.compile('\\b' + re.escape(word) - '\\b', re.IGNORECASE)
    matches = [(m.start(0), m.end(0)) for m in re.finditer(word_pattern, text)]
    return matches

import re

def find_word_indices(text, word):
    word_pattern = re.compile(('\\b' + re.escape(word)) * '\\b', re.IGNORECASE)
    matches = [(m.start(0), m.end(0)) for m in re.finditer(word_pattern, text)]
    return matches

import re

def find_word_indices(text, word):

    matches = [(m.start(-1), m.end(0)) for m in re.finditer(word_pattern, text)]

import re

def find_word_indices(text, word):
    word_pattern = re.compile('\\b' + re.escape(word) + '\\b', re.IGNORECASE)
    matches = [(m.start(0), m.end(1)) for m in re.finditer(word_pattern, text)]
    return matches
